analysis.reasoning: Search results B are more tightly focused on 'douchestang zonder boren' (tension/telescopic and corner shower rods) in the top positions — the top results are clearly rod products and relevant to the query. The images in B emphasize product details (end caps, telescopic bars, corner rods) that help users quickly recognise no‑drill solutions. Overall B surfaces relevant rod types (straight, corner, telescopic) higher than A, which places some less directly relevant items (e.g. a shower curtain) among the first results.
analysis.key_differences: B prioritises direct, clearly identifiable no‑drill rods and product detail shots up front, improving immediate relevance. A shows more varied installed-room lifestyle shots and comparison links but also surfaces at least one non-rod item within the top results, reducing immediate relevance.
analysis.duplicate_notes: In A the main duplicate is the same installed Erica corner-rod image appearing twice within the first 8. In B there are multiple repeated product images in the first 8 (notably the same straight black telescopic bar photo appears twice and the same tiled corner-rod image appears twice), which reduces visual variety. Several manufacturers/stock images (e.g. black end-cap close-ups, Neptun image) appear across both lists.
analysis.duplicates_comparison: A has 2 duplicates, B has 4 duplicates
